branches.text:
You awaken on a desolate battlefield, surrounded by a thick fog.
The air feels heavy and cold, filled with echoes of distant voices.
Shadows stretch across the ground, where remnants of a recent struggle lie.
You regain consciousness and notice your friends are scattered on the battleground... Who do you seek for aid:

choices.outcome:
Jasmin: (With no words Jasmin hugs you)
... I thought you were gone. You took quite a hit... all this time...we should have never trusted them.

Llewellyn: Ah glad to see you've woken up from that sleep you were in. As you may or may not remember
(He points to a cloaked figure)
I don't know how but we need to stop them.

Mthi: Do my eyes deceive me?
What would we do without you? Don't go doing that again.
(She smiles faintly and hugs you)
Anyway our problem lies with them.

Zanele: You poor little thing... I thought you were dead.
(She hugs you with a sigh of relief). We need to make them pay for this, for everything.

Tino: Well well well, your return's presence is right on time.
Thank you for not dying on us... at least yet (He smiles at you).
